name: Three Brothers' Bond
text: Main Look at the top 5 cards of your deck and reveal up to one cost 5 or less [Sabo] or [Portgaz D. Ace] or [Monkey D. Luffy] then put it into your hand. Then, place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Trigger Activate this card's Main ability.
